channel.title: UK on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in UK on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: US Tech Giants Race to Spend Billions in UK AI Push
item.description: Microsoft and Nvidia unveiled plans to invest up to $45 billion in the UK during US President Donald Trump’s state visit.

item.title: US Tech Giants Race to Spend Billions in UK AI Push
item.description: Microsoft and Nvidia unveiled plans to invest up to $45 billion in the UK during US President Donald Trump’s state visit.

item.title: VPN use soars in UK after age-verification laws go into effect
item.description: Proton VPN sign-ups originating in the UK increased by over 1,400 percent.

item.title: The Pandemic Appears to Have Accelerated Brain Aging, Even in People Who Never Got Covid
item.description: Stress, isolation, and uncertainty appear to have caused the brain to age quicker for those who lived through the crisis.

item.title: The Pandemic Appears to Have Accelerated Brain Aging, Even in People Who Never Got Covid
item.description: Stress, isolation, and uncertainty appear to have caused the brain to age quicker for those who lived through the crisis.

item.title: Age Verification Laws Send VPN Use Soaring—and Threaten the Open Internet
item.description: A law requiring UK internet users to verify their age to access adult content has led to a huge surge in VPN downloads—and has experts worried about the future of free expression online.

item.title: Age Verification Laws Send VPN Use Soaring—and Threaten the Open Internet
item.description: A law requiring UK internet users to verify their age to access adult content has led to a huge surge in VPN downloads—and has experts worried about the future of free expression online.

item.title: The Age-Checked Internet Has Arrived
item.description: Starting today, UK adults will have to prove their age to access porn online. Experts warn that a global wave of age-check laws threatens to chill speech and ultimately harm children and adults alike.

item.title: The Age-Checked Internet Has Arrived
item.description: Starting today, UK adults will have to prove their age to access porn online. Experts warn that a global wave of age-check laws threatens to chill speech and ultimately harm children and adults alike.

item.title: UK backing down on Apple encryption backdoor after pressure from US
item.description: UK officials fear their insistence on backdoor endangers tech deals with US.
